message.content:
1. Low-level laser therapy (LLLLT) is used for healing purposes.
2. LLLLT can be applied to damaged cells.
3. The purpose of using LLLLT on damaged cells is to promote healing.

messages.content:
Statement: One purported use of low-level laser therapy (LLLT) is to promote healing in damaged cells.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
